title: 发现一熊孩子严重抄袭，版主看到请处理
author: 1125043380kjr
txt_content:
这是我发的贴，绝对的原帖！
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=145382&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D8%26searchoption%5B71%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%D2%B9%C4%BB%C9%BD%D7%AF%26searchoption%5B71%5D%5Btype%5D%3D%26sortid%3D8
然后，这位熊孩子的盗版贴：
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=157818&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D8%26searchoption%5B71%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3DCF%26searchoption%5B71%5D%5Btype%5D%3D%26sortid%3D8
希望版主看到后可以处理这件事

replies.author: 1125043380kjr
replies.txt_content: 版主在吗....

replies.author: 路人甲B
replies.txt_content: 打击盗版，支持正版，挺（虽然我讨厌CF）

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2013-12-23 19:56 编辑 

啊！！原来是这样！！好吧我赞同版主处理！！
尽管错版了......

replies.author: abalala
replies.txt_content: 支持正版！拒绝盗版！本人讨厌盗版！没良心！

replies.author: songfeitong
replies.txt_content: n个月了你才发现

replies.author: crj125
replies.txt_content: 小学生好多啊

replies.author: luanhaoyi
replies.txt_content:
2ol2 发表于 2013-12-23 19:59 
又是无聊的CF，已踩不谢，我是不会同情你的。让那个熊孩子也和你一起去末地吧！
鄙视其他作者的行为是不被允许的

replies.txt_content: 好吧，作业太多心情有点不好……大家原谅我……
